articles.title: Biden's top science adviser, Eric Lander, resigns amid reports of bullying - POLITICO
articles.description: The White House initially stood by him despite the president’s zero-tolerance policy and numerous credible reports of misconduct.

articles.author: Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Nord Stream 2 pipeline proves to be a sticking point in Biden and new German chancellor's show of unity - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden and German Chancellor Olaf Scholz sought to put on a united front Monday at the White House, but one key sticking point appeared to remain despite their pledges of unity: The future of the Nord Stream 2 gas pipeline.
